'''Bei'er''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] that appeared in the [[Lantern Rite]] quest ''[[Currents Deep Beneath the Lanterns]]''.

He is a member of the [[Treasure Hoarders]] who, along with [[Crafty]], gets into a fight with [[Xiao]] and the [[Traveler]] over the [[Letter to the Treasure Hoarders|mysterious letter]] they received.
